title.rendered: “A true heart of a lion and kind spirit” – Bear Grylls wants Kohli to appear on Man vs. Wild

content.rendered:
Bear Grylls, the hero of adventure world expressed his desire to work with Indian star cricketer Virat Kohli . As per report, “Virat would be amazing to join Man vs Wild as he has a heart of lion and kind spirit,” said Grylls. Earlier, PM Modi and Actor Ranvir Singh have joined him.

Read Also: Indian men’s hockey team creates history in Birmingham, biggest ever win at Commonwealth Games
